item.title: Pwning a pwnable calc (writeup)
item.description: Hi! A friend of mine presented me a website with several linux binaries waiting to be exploited. At the time he told me they were very difficult. I found that to actually be an understatement. Even the first challenge on pwnable.tw (which is supposed to be just a hello, binexp) required a lot of thinking to me. If you are into binary exploitation and already have some experience, I very much recommend that you give it a try.
